channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-15108] TestReplicationAdmin failed on branch-1.0
item.description:
I notice it on HBASE-15095.

See
https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/95/artifact/patchprocess/patch-unit-hbase-server-jdk1.8.0.txt

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: It happens when convert HashMap to String by iterate HashMap entries one by one. Sometimes the order mess up, i replace HashMap with TreeMap.
